刺激快乐 开黑必备
I'd recommend this to other players because I've played for over 93 hours.

The game is fun.... When people are bad at it. At the lower ranks this game plays smoothly, its so fun and its an equal playing field... but...

Survivors in the higher ranks 100% always have an advantage over the killer. The killer becomes so stressful and sweaty to play at the higher ranks that if you arent performing perfectly chances are you are going to lose hard. Killer just becomes a chore and its no wonder why its so hard to find a game as survivor, and so incredibly easy as killer. NO ONE LIKES PLAYING KILLER. Most killers feel underwhelming and weak. The only ones that feel like you have some sort of control are Spirit, Oni, Nurse, or some sort of killer with Anti loop in their kit. And if you go against a group of survivors that are on comms (aka SWF) you 100% lost the game unless you sunk 5000 hours into the game and know every loop, map and tech with the killer you are playing to the T.

If you play survivor, its hit or miss if youre playing solo. Sometimes you get people who work together and others while others you have complete bots on your team. But other than that, survivor is way more fun to play than killer because its no where near as stressful and you dont even need to sweat at all in order to outplay and outperform most killers because you have loads of different ways to get second chances with perks etc. I learned how to run the most OP loops in this game rather quickly, which you think would help you counter them as killer, but it doesnt work like that. God pallets, safe loops etc etc are littered over many maps and basically learning how to use those tools properly will ensure you escape 99% of chases unless you fuck up.

My advice, dont take this game seriously. dont rank up. Enjoy the brown ranks because thats the only way to enjoy this game unless you want to sink thousands of hours into this game and master everything.

dead by daylight looks a lot like a horror game. and i can't fault you for thinking it actually is a horror game! it walks like a horror game, and it talks like a horror game, so therefore it must be a horror game. right?

mmm... kind of.

dead by daylight is in fact competitive hide and seek. sure, when you start out, the idea of being killed and the heartbeats and scary noises might stress you out. desensitise yourself to all that in a few games by playing as the killer, and what you have after scratching through the cosmetic surface is a really cool pvp hide and seek game where you can play as famous characters from scary tv shows and movies, as well as a bunch of original characters too.

sure there's lots of lore and stuff but at its heart, dbd is the next evolution of fan favourite games such as prophunt. with deeper rules and mechanics, and a lot of interplay between different perks and killer powers, i really can't overstate how enjoyable this game is. it's great for playing solo as the killer, and for playing with your friends as survivors.

the matchmaking leaves a lot to be desired, and sometimes you'll just have a bad game. don't let that stop you. the same way things like that never stopped anyone playing other popular online games like league, or overwatch, or destiny, or whatever else.

Jó pontozást kapott tőlem, bár van min javítani. Például:
- A DLC-kre az ember gatyája is rámegy, ha enged a csábításnak.
- A community olyan salty, mint az Észak-Tanzániai Nátron-tó. Aki mégsem, az mazochista vagy szadista.
- Minden második gyilkos camper, Minden nyolcadik túlélő teabag-el, mint egy BF noob.
- Annyi a csaló, mint égen a csillag.
- Ha pallót dobsz a gyilkos elé vagy lecsap vagy átbugol a te oldaladra. Ha átugrasz egy palánkon, még épp elér és lebaltáz/kampóz/késel/botol/fütölőz vagy egyéb.
- Éjszakánként a meccs keresés oly kényelmes és gyors, hogy két meccs között meg tudok nézni egy részt a sorozatomból. Mármint ha túlélőben mennék. A gyilkossal ugyanígy van, csak nappal.
- Ja, és jelenleg olyan klassz az animáció, hogy ha leakasztod az embert a kampóról, azonnal magad mellé teszed le. Egyes szekrényekből kilógsz, felbugolsz tereptárgyakra, stb.
Hmm... Miért is jó ez a játék?
Gayet zevkli bir oyun hele bir ekibiniz varsa oyunu saatlerce oynayabilirsiniz...

You must run a verify game file integrity scan every time before opening the game or it won't connect to online. Almost every game that I play if I spend too much time repairing gens it will crash to desktop. Then because the game crashes so often I get banned.

I have a 5700xt GPU and Ryzen 3600 CPU.
ok. gideri var

So this is where this review could be a bit doggy, just for the simple fact that i'm not biased but i'm not exactly sold either. 

Start with the pros
-its fun 
       whether you play a killer or a survivor the game is generally fun though its best played with friends 
-gampelay is unique
        i have played a lot of games and i have yet to find one that is exactly like it plus the perk system is fun and comprehensive 

now for the cons

-tunneling ,slugging and just general overall toxicity
      a lot of killers tend to tunnel or just follow one person until they get the hit, which is the point of the game but a lot of people tend to take it to an extreme, even to the point of knocking all the survivors down and leaving them like that till they all die, i.e slugging, and the general toxic nature of this game can be pretty bad, with alot of survivors openly mocking and trolling the killer, i.e teabagging, blocking the killer from being able to perform their basic functions, i.e hooking anyone who has been downed, and there are maps where even if the killer is pretty quick, the Survivor can just loop them repeatedly without fear of getting hit( looking at you Cold Wind Farm) at which point they just mock the killer. 

all in all i do enjoy this game but I've owned it for years and I'm just now playing it because i'm playing it with my friends and not toxic randos. so that should tell you what kind of game this is.

Vamos la.
Jogo totalmente desbalanceado, criaram um sistema  novo de Rank, onde ele nao funciona, e as recompensas, nem assim posso chama-las, ja que esmola pra mim nao conta.

Fora isso, o jogo e totalmente MAL OTIZIMIZADO, onde um GTA da vida roda tudo no FULL, mas o Golden Alecrin do DbD nao roda nem sequer no minimo sem travar, se voce jogar pelo Playstation, meus pesames, alem de sofrer bullying da comunidade dentro e fora do jogo, voce ainda vai se deparar com slides na tela, toda santa vez que usar a perk tao famosa chamada "Pai Duro", fora que dependendo das habilidades do killer, o jogo trava ainda mais. 

Apesar de tudo isso, a empresa segue em frente criando skins atras de skins e sem sequer se importar com a real situacao do jogo atualmente, e sobre isso, e ta tudo bem, espero ter ajudado!!!

Allthough I don't have a good amount of time put into this game (Compared to most people) I can however surely say that this game is really lacking in many places, both on the devs side and games side.

To begin with, the game itself is only really fun if you're playing with friends in a private lobby. If you do play alone however, you'll either be unbelivably anal fisted by god like people or you'll be crunching the ballsacks of newly joined people. 

Then there is also the problem with the devs, they have the same sort of problems Blizzard deals with, which is adding or patching stuff that nobody asked for and the entire community needs to scream at the top of their lungs for the devs to just either fuck it or something else up even.

I have watched people played this years before I actually bought this and now a good amount of strats and stuff from get-go but from what I know of this so far, literally not worth it, not even for private games w/ friends.

El juego es entretenido y sencillo, jugando solo desde la perspectiva de superviviente, el suspenso y la accion te mantienen muy entretenido además, si llevas amigos la cosa se pone mas divertida, realmente el hecho que sea un juego con crossplay lo hace aún mejor dado que no hay impedimentos de donde juegues.
Por el lado malo esta la optimización en PC, es pesado para lo que es aunque igual y hay mas contenido que no juego, aún asi pesa mucho y presenta algunos tirones leves en algunos mapas y situaciones especificas, el matchmaking tarda de 2 a 5 minutos o más, asi que tener otra cosa con que entretenerse mientras esperas es algo a tomar en cuenta.

Ever since you decided to literally change the entire game into what looks like the mobile port of the game, there have been nonstop bugs and issues that I have encountered. Pallets not stunning killers, literally hearing 0 audio from killers without stealth perks, pressing space but still dying on hook, etc. Not really sure how you broke your entire game in one update but here we are! Also the frames have been d r o p p i n g since the update considering I've never lagged or had issues with framerate in the past with dbd. Used to really enjoy this game but you guys ruined something that used to actually be fun, ggez! also because it needed to be said absolutely LOVE doing 4 gens and still de-pipping because of camping and tunneling killers LMFAO this game is fully a joke. play idv for a better more BALANCED experience <3 fix window hitboxes as well.  why the fuck am i getting hit through walls and windows...GTR
